text: Eṅkaḷ iṟaivaṉē! Eṅkaḷ iruvaraiyum uṉṉai muṟṟilum vaḻipaṭum muslimkaḷākkuvāyāka, eṅkaḷ cantatiyiṉariṭamiruntum uṉṉai muṟṟilum vaḻipaṭum oru kūṭṭattiṉarai (muslim camutāyattai)ākki vaippāyāka, nāṅkaḷ uṉṉai vaḻipaṭum vaḻikaḷaiyum aṟivittaruḷvāyāka, eṅkaḷai(k karuṇaiyuṭaṉ nōkki eṅkaḷ piḻaikaḷai) maṉṉippāyāka, niccayamāka nīyē mikka maṉṉippōṉum, aḷavilā aṉpuṭaiyōṉākavum irukkiṉṟāy
